_comment: EPQr scale from selected personality data from three wave SAPA-Project by David Condon: 08Dec2013 to 26Jul2014 / 26jul2014 to 22dec2015 / 22dec2015 to 07feb2017, data from three wave survey was bound in RStudio. Item info was presented in English language but participant's origin is specified in variable 'country'. All of the items were administered with the same six response options
datasetApaReference: wave 1: Condon, David M.; Revelle, William, 2015, 'Selected personality data from the SAPA-Project: 08Dec2013 to 26Jul2014', https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/SD7SVE, Harvard Dataverse, V4, UNF:6:9B60JNIFXXKXmyLhABjoUA==; wave 2: Condon, David; Roney, Ellen; Revelle, William, 2017, 'Selected personality data from the SAPA-Project: 26Jul2014 to 22Dec2015', https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/GU70EV, Harvard Dataverse, V2, UNF:6:lghIwf9uBMIg3wHkM8nOEg== [fileUNF]; wave 3: Condon, David; Roney, Ellen; Revelle, William, 2017, 'Selected personality data from the SAPA-Project: 22Dec2015 to 07Feb2017', https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/TZJGAT, Harvard Dataverse, V2, UNF:6:+zDglHZEg5KlTdNuYA1/CQ== [fileUNF];

instruments.instrumentApaReference: Eysenck, S H, Eysenck, S and Barrett, P (1985). “A revised version of the psychoticism scale” Personality and Individual Differences 6(1): 21–29, DOI: https://doi.org/10.1007/978-1-4613-2413-3

items.itemStemText: I have many different hobbies.
I stop to think things over before doing anything.
I my mood often goes up and down.
I often take notice of what people think.
I am a talkative person.
I being in debt is worrisome to me.
I sometimes feel 'just miserable' for no reason.
I give money to charities.
I am rather lively.
I it would upset me a lot to see a child or animal suffer.
I often worry about things I should not have done or said.
I dislike people who don't know how to behave themselves.
I can usually let myself go and enjoy a lively party.
I am an irritable person.
I people should always respect the law.
I enjoy meeting new people.
I good manners are very important.
I my feelings are easily hurt.
I tend to keep in the background on social occasions.
I would take drugs which may have strange or dangerous effects.
I often feel 'fed-up.'
I like going out a lot.
I prefer to go my own way rather than act by the rules.
I enjoy hurting people I love.
I am often troubled by feelings of guilt.
I prefer reading to meeting people.
I have enemies who want to harm me.
I would call myself a nervous person.
I have many friends.
I enjoy practical jokes that can sometimes really hurt people.
I am a worrier.
I would call myself happy-go-lucky.
I good manners and cleanliness matter to me.
I have often gone against my parents' wishes.
I worry about awful things that might happen.
I usually take the initiative in making new friends.
I would call myself tense or 'highly-strung.'
I am mostly quiet when with other people.
I think marriage is old-fashioned and should be done away with.
I am more easy-going about right and wrong than most people.
I can easily get some life into a dull party.
I worry about my health.
I enjoy cooperating with others.
I like telling jokes and funny stories to my friends.
I most things taste the same to me.
I like mixing with people.
I worry if I know there are mistakes in my work.
I suffer from sleeplessness.
I people have said that I sometimes act rashly.
I nearly always have a 'ready answer' when talking to people.
I like to arrive at appointments in plenty of time.
I often feel listless and tired for no reason.
I like doing things in which I have to act quickly.
I my mother is (or was) a good woman.
I often make decisions on the spur of the moment.
I often feel life is very dull.
I often take on more activities than I have time for.
I there are several people who keep trying to avoid me.
I worry a lot about my looks.
I people spend too much time safeguarding their future with savings and insurance.
I have once wished that I were dead.
I can get a party going.
I try not to be rude to people.
I worry too long after an embarrassing experience.
I generally 'look before I leap.'
I suffer from 'nerves.'
I often feel lonely.
I trust people to mainly tell the truth.
I am easily hurt when people find fault with me or the work I do.
I it is better to follow society's rules than to go my own way.
I like having plenty of bustle and excitement around.
I would like for other people to be afraid of me.
I am sometimes bubbling over with energy and sometimes very sluggish.
I other people think of me as being very lively.
I tell a lot of lies.
I believe one has special duties to one's family.
I am touchy about some things.
I would feel very sorry for an animal caught in a trap.
I when my temper rises, I find it difficult to control.
